introduction:
Ah, I was not expecting such... esteemed guests; no matter, I shall make time. 
King Mithradates, fourth of my name, welcomes you to the Kingdom of Pontus
...
You haven't heard of my exalted bloodline? 
Ah, remind me, did you say you were Persian or Greek?
neutralHello: What might the humble Mithridates do for you friend...?
hateHello: Oh my Gods... I'm speechless. Absolutely dumbfounded. What could drive so many foreigners to butcher their friends, neighbors, countrymen, just for speaking the tongue of your people? I'm sorry, I'm beyond words, truly. We've had a couple squabbles in the past, but you must've understood, I mean you can't have thought me so cruel or insane that I could condone such an atrocity; and by those acting as your allies, I mean I don't even feel like I know this land anymore. I promise I'll do everything I can to see these sectarian massacres end at once. A tragedy, really. My deepest condolences.
